project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion CLI Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement the temperature input handling and validation
Implement the conversion logic for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement the conversion logic for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement the conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement the conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement the conversion logic for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement the conversion logic for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Write tests for each conversion logic implemented
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
